positions.description:
Program Manager - Federal Records Task Lead - Department of Education, Regulatory Information Management Services, Records Management and Privacy Division.  Provide leadership, oversight, and coordination to ensure Departmental compliance with government initiatives regarding the acquisition, release and maintenance of information.  The Records Management Division is responsible for developing and implementing strategies and programs designed to ensure compliance with federal information management requirements.

* Serves as the Department's principal authority and representative on records management statutory, regulatory and policy requirements to assure compliance with National Archives and Records Administration (NARA) directives. 
* Develops clear and consistent business rules (standards) for records management, administrative safeguards for protecting personally identifiable information. 
* Provide guidance and instruction to Department staff for the appropriate handling, maintenance and disposition of records. 
* Develops and provides print and web-based training to Department employees and contractors regarding records management lifecycle and file plan development.
